summary: "X-Men," a 2000 superhero movie directed by Bryan Singer, is about a world where some people are mutants with special powers. It follows Wolverine and Rogue as they join Charles Xavier's X-Men to fight against Magneto's Brotherhood of Mutants. The film shows humans' fear of mutants and the struggle for acceptance. With an all-star cast, it was a big hit, making over $296 million and starting a successful movie series. It was based on the Marvel Comics team created by Stan Lee and Jack Kirby.
title: X-Men (film)
